SEARCH
Package server

Class Commands

java.lang.Object
server.Commands
public class Commands extends Object
The Commands class handles the execution of various commands issued by users, such as retrieving user information, messaging, channel operations, and more.

    private static void
    channel(String message, int channel, Peticio user)
    Sends a message to all users in a specific channel.

    Executes the given command for the specified user.

    exit(Peticio user)
    Removes the user from the server and closes their socket connection.

    Sends a message to all users in the same channel as the given user.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public static void execute(String command, Peticio user)
      Executes the given command for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to execute.
      user - The user who issued the command.

    • whoIs

      private static void whoIs(Peticio user)
      Sends a list of users in the same channel as the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user who requested the list of users.

    • message

      private static void message(String message, Peticio user)
      Sends a message to all users in the same channel as the given user.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send.
      user - The user who sent the message.

    • channel

      private static void channel(String message, int channel, Peticio user)
      Sends a message to all users in a specific channel.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send.
      channel - The channel where the message will be sent.
      user - The user who sent the message.

    • exit

      private static void exit(Peticio user)
      Removes the user from the server and closes their socket connection.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to remove from the server.

    • channels

      private static void channels(Peticio user)
      Sends the list of available channels to the user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user who requested the list of channels.
